devdoc.author: CEDB4G08
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

addCandidate(uint256,string,uint256,stri.details: require the job status to be true for intake

params._age: recieve the age of the candidate
params._applJobId: recieve the job id of the job whic candidate applied to
params._name: recieve the name of the candidate
params._phNumber: recieve the phone number of the candidate
params._qual: recieve the qualifications of the candidate

params._location: recieve the location of the job
params._reward: recieve the reward promised for the job

addPerfMatrix(address,address,uint256,ui.details: require the employer to be the msg sender to ensure valid input

params._enrolledJobId: recieve enrolled job id of the candidate

params._jobId: recieve the job id for which the status should be changed

getAllJobs().return: number of jobs written in blockchain

params._candidate: recieve the candidate for which the information to be retrieved

getCandidate(uint256).return: applJobId returns the applied job idapplCandAddress returns the address of the candidate applied for the jobname returns the name of the candidateage returns the age of the candidatephNumber returns the phone number of teh candidatequal returns the qualification of the candidate

getJob(uint256).details: require jobid to be between 0 and total length

params._jobId: recieve the job id for which the details should be retrieved

getJob(uint256).return: empAddress returns the employer addressid returns the job idcompanyName returns the company namejobTitle returns the job titlelocation returns the location of the jobjobType returns the job typereward returns the reward for the job

params._jobId: recieve the job id for which the details should be retrieved

getJobDetails(uint256).return: empAddress returns the employer addressreward returns the reward for the job

params._jobId: recieves the job id for which the candidate enrolled

getPerfMatrix(uint256).return: candAddress returns the candidate addressvEmpAddress returns the verified employer addressenrolledJobId returns the enrolled job idevalScore returns the evaluation score of candidate

getVerifiedEmployer(uint256).details: require the employer id to be between 0 and total number

params._empVId: recieves the employer verification id to retrieve particular employer

getVerifiedEmployer(uint256).return: id returns the id of employerverifiedEmpAddress returns the verified employer addressverifiedEmpName returns the verified employer name

devdoc.title: Credit Incentive Employment Generation, DApp Job/Internship portal

addCandidate(uint256,string,uint256,stri.notice: Function to add a candidate to a job

addJob(uint256,string,string,string,stri.notice: Function to add a job by verified employer

addPerfMatrix(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Function to add performance matrix of a candidate

changeJobStatus(uint256).notice: Function which is used internally to change the job status

methods.constructor: Constructor for retrieving the owner address

getAllJobs().notice: Function to retrieve the total number of jobs

getAllVEmployers().notice: Function to retrieve the total number of verified employers

getCandidate(uint256).notice: Function to retrieve the candidate details

getJob(uint256).notice: Function to retrieve the job details

getJobDetails(uint256).notice: Function to retrieve specific job details

getPerfMatrix(uint256).notice: Function to retrieve the performance matrix of the candidate

getVerifiedEmployer(uint256).notice: Function to retrieve the verified employer

userdoc.notice: This contract can be used to post jobs, recruit willing candidates and more.
